scripts.cf:preview: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler pages dev .open-next/cloudflare
scripts.cf:deploy: node scripts/check-cloudflare-env.js && npm run cf:build && npx wrangler pages deploy .open-next/cloudflare --project-name=ai-agent-studio
scripts.cf:deploy:local: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler pages deploy .open-next/cloudflare --project-name=ai-agent-studio
